section.title: New: &XeTeX;
section.para: &XeTeX; version 0.996-patch1 has been integrated into the &MiKTeX; distribution. If you are looking for a Unicode-based &TeX; engine, or if want to access &Windows; fonts, then you should give &XeTeX; a try.
